title: Nutella cheesecake
directions: Grind the cookies on a mixer, food processor or in a mortar, and place the result in different glasses. They will be the first layer of the cake.

In medium size bowl, mix the cream cheese, the Nutella and the whipping cream with a mixer until everything is blended in a dense cream. Put this in a piping bag and fill cream in the glasses where you previously placed the ground Oreos. Place it in the fridge until the moment to be served. (A minimum of 2 hours is requested).
Take out of the fridge and place some hazelnut ice cream over it. Dust it With the grated chocolate.
ingredients: For the first layer 12 Oreo cookies ground
For the second layer: 250 gr of cream cheese, 4 spoons of Nutella, 200 ml of whipping cream
For the topping: hazelnut ice cream and grated 70% dark chocolate
